resources.string:
DOUGH RECIPE : 
 
250 g floor type 55 
20 g sugar 
5 g salt 
6 g baker's yeast 
10 g honey 
50 g milk 
125 g water temperature : 30C 
25 g smelt butter 
125 g butter temperature : 20C 
1 egg 
1 chocolate 
 
COOKING : 180C (360F) during 17 minutes

DOUGH RECIPE : 
 
250 g floor type 55 
20 g sugar 
5 g salt 
6 g baker's yeast 
10 g honey 
50 g milk 
125 g water temperature : 30C 
25 g smelt butter 
125 g butter temperature : 20C 
1 egg 
 
COOKING : 180C (360F) during 17minutes

DOUGH RECIPE : 
 
400 g floor type 55 
300 g butter in small pieces 
200 ml temperate water 
8 g salt 
 
PUFF PASTRY PALM RECIPE :: 
 
200 g sugar. 
use sugar instead of floor, 
fold in 4, 
fold in 3 x 3times, 
cook 24 minutes at 425F or 220 C, 
at 12 minutes flip them all.
work in progress, click on pictures :)
